title: Official Firecracker Vayne splash is basically NSFW

replies.body:
Meanwhile, like 95% of YouTube comments under the new Lunar Revel Login Theme are busy discussing a piggy's butt 

https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcQxnTpPY9YwxFB1DgKD5iIvjntjJqgUI3deX59Wz_1X7gaP5RLp4w
She's wearing more coverage than I've seen on other champions. You must be a puritan if you think that splash is NSFW.

> [{quoted}](name=Oleandervine,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=Evf9eegF,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2019-01-29T20:59:09.574+0000)
>
> She's wearing more coverage than I've seen on other champions. You must be a puritan if you think that splash is NSFW.

The coverage doesn't seem to matter; she manages to be NSFW. Isn't it a glorious splash art? I frequently criticize Riot's focus on cosmetic items, but damn.

> [{quoted}](name=KFCeytron,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=Evf9eegF,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2019-01-29T21:17:18.017+0000)
>
> The coverage doesn't seem to matter; she manages to be NSFW. Isn't it a glorious splash art? I frequently criticize Riot's focus on cosmetic items, but damn.

I mean, it is a nice splash art. But I've seen more clever ones like Fifth Age Taric.
It is? By that logic, my Dune books are not safe for work too, and yet noone even bats an eye every time i read them in public.

> [{quoted}](name=GreenKnight,realm=EUNE,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=Evf9eegF,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2019-01-29T20:44:18.457+0000)
>
> It is? By that logic, my Dune books are not safe for work too, and yet noone even bats an eye every time i read them in public.

Dune covers feature Vayne in thigh-highs now? I am surprised but pleased.

> [{quoted}](name=KFCeytron,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=Evf9eegF,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2019-01-29T20:47:48.168+0000)
>
> Dune covers feature Vayne in thigh-highs now? I am surprised but pleased.

I'm not sure if this character is named Vayne, but thighs are pretty heavily featured. 

Along with other... assets.
A lot of League splasharts you would not want to be seen looking at when your at work or school. Not much new.

> [{quoted}](name=Arakadia,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=Evf9eegF,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2019-01-29T20:14:37.688+0000)
>
> A lot of League splasharts you would not want to be seen looking at when your at work or school. Not much new.

This one fits that more than e.g. the MF or Eve splashes, though (in my opinion).

https://thumbs.gfycat.com/NearJaggedKoi-poster.jpg

What exactly makes it NSFW?
Her tits barely being covered(and being covered by something almost the same color as her skin)?
Her thigh-highs + see-through leggings(conveniently see-through so you can see the goods)?
Both?

Eh. I've seen worse splash arts.

> [{quoted}](name=4 Step Cadence,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=Evf9eegF,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2019-01-29T20:55:16.403+0000)
>
> What exactly makes it NSFW?
> Her tits barely being covered(and being covered by something almost the same color as her skin)?
> Her thigh-highs + see-through leggings(conveniently see-through so you can see the goods)?
> Both?
> 
> Eh. I've seen worse splash arts.

I don't know how she does it, but she does it.
